prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Synth Pad, Piano, Guitar, Drums, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Organ, Synth Pad, Piano, Guitar, and Drums, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Organ, Synth Pad, Piano, Guitar, and Drums, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
This song is made up of Organ, Synth Pad, Piano, Guitar, and Drums, Bass excluded.
